I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Goal:
forall (net : network) (e : entry), directly_committed (mgv_deghost net) e -> lifted_directly_committed net e

Premises:
mgv_deghost = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (msg_ghost_params : MsgGhostMultiParams multi_params) (net : network) => {| nwPackets := map mgv_deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let H := X in let nwState0 := nwState H in nwState0 end |} : forall (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (msg_ghost_params : MsgGhostMultiParams multi_params), network -> network Arguments mgv_deghost {base_params multi_params msg_ghost_params}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
lifted_directly_committed = fun (net : ghost_log_network) (e : entry) => exists quorum : list Net.name, NoDup quorum /\ length quorum > div2 (length nodes) /\ (forall h : Net.name, In h quorum -> In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) : ghost_log_network -> entry -> Prop
directly_committed = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (e : entry) => exists quorum : list Net.name, NoDup quorum /\ length quorum > div2 (length nodes) /\ (forall h : Net.name, In h quorum -> In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> entry -> Prop Arguments directly_committed {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
lifted_directly_committed_directly_committed : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (e : entry), lifted_directly_committed net e -> directly_committed (mgv_deghost net) e
msg_commit_recorded_lift_intro : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= lastApplied (snd (nwState net h)) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) -> commit_recorded (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) h e
leader_completeness_directly_committed = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (t : nat) (e : entry) (log : list entry) (h : Net.name), directly_committed net e -> t > eTerm e -> In (t, log) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e log : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leader_completeness_directly_committed {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
msg_lifted_sms_nw : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (h : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), state_machine_safety (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) -> In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> t >= currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) -> commit_recorded (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) h e -> prevLogIndex > eIndex e \/ prevLogIndex = eIndex e /\ prevLogTerm = eTerm e \/ eIndex e > maxIndex entries \/ In e entries
lifted_committed = fun (net : ghost_log_network) (e : entry) (t : term) => exists (h : Net.name) (e' : entry), eTerm e' <= t /\ lifted_directly_committed net e' /\ eIndex e <= eIndex e' /\ In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) /\ In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) : ghost_log_network -> entry -> term -> Prop
lifted_sms_nw : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), state_machine_safety (deghost net) -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> t >= currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) -> commit_recorded (deghost net) h e -> prevLogIndex > eIndex e \/ prevLogIndex = eIndex e /\ prevLogTerm = eTerm e \/ eIndex e > maxIndex entries \/ In e entries
contiguous_range_exact_lo_elim_lt : forall (es : list entry) (lo : nat) (e : entry), contiguous_range_exact_lo es lo -> In e es -> lo < eIndex e
findAtIndex_elim : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e -> i = eIndex e /\ In e l
maxIndex_removeAfterIndex : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e = i -> maxIndex (removeAfterIndex l i) = i
transitive_commit = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e e' : entry) (t : term), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= eIndex e' -> committed net e' t -> committed net e t : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments transitive_commit {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
match_index_all_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (e : entry) (leader : Net.name) (h : name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> eIndex e <= assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex (snd (nwState net leader))) h 0 -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments match_index_all_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record raft_msg_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface { msg_refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P ->...-> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (mgv_deghost net) } Arguments raft_msg_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface : (forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot P -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) ->...-> raft_msg_refinement_interface
msg_deghost_spec : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name), nwState (mgv_deghost net) h = nwState net h
msg_lift_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) -> forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (mgv_deghost net)
Record terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface { terms_and_indices_from_one_log_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log net; terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw net } Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _)%function_scope
one_leaderLog_per_term_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (t : term) (ll ll' : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t, ll') (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h'))) -> h = h' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments one_leaderLog_per_term_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
one_leaderLog_per_term_log = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (t : term) (ll ll' : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t, ll') (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h'))) -> ll = ll' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments one_leaderLog_per_term_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
in_mgv_ghost_packet : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (p : packet), In p (nwPackets net) -> In (mgv_deghost_packet p) (nwPackets (mgv_deghost net))
mgv_ghost_invariant_lift : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (failed failed' : list Net.name) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net -> P net') -> forall (net net' : network) (failed failed' : list Net.name) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P (mgv_deghost net) -> P (mgv_deghost net') where ?base_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface si : sorted_interface lmi : log_matching_interface smspi : state_machine_safety'interface rlmli : refined_log_matching_lem...
msg_simulation_1 : forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (mgv_deghost net)
one_leaderLog_per_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (t : term) (ll ll' : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t, ll') (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h'))) -> h = h' /\ ll = ll' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments one_leaderLog_per_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
msg_lift_prop_all_the_way : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) -> forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (deghost (mgv_deghost net))
ghost_log_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (l : ghost_msg) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> fst (pBody p) = l ->...-> Prop Arguments ghost_log_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> exists ll es : list entry, In (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)), ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) /\ log (snd (nwState net h)) = es ++ ll /\ (forall e : entry, In e es -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
ghost_log_entries_match_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (p : packet), In p (nwPackets net) -> entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) (fst (pBody p)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments ghost_log_entries_match_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (P : list entry -> Prop) (p : packet), msg_log_property P -> In p (nwPackets net) -> P (fst (pBody p)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
eTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, _, eTerm, _) := e in eTerm : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> term Arguments eTerm {orig_base_params raft_params}
eIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, eIndex, _, _) := e in eIndex : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> logIndex Arguments eIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}

apply lifted_directly_committed_directly_committed.
